commands.name: jpcom
commands.description: List all custom JP commands and what they do.

commands.name: jpdoctor
commands.description: Check presence/versions of key CLI tools and suggest Homebrew installs.

commands.name: clean-ds
commands.description: Safely remove .DS_Store and AppleDouble (._*) files under a directory.

commands.name: cleanzip
commands.description: Create a clean, deterministic-ish zip of a directory, excluding build, cache, junk, and secret files.

commands.name: snaprepo
commands.description: Snapshot the current git repo as a clean zip using cleanzip.

commands.name: gpatch
commands.description: Apply a unified diff from the clipboard or a file with a safety check.

commands.name: gbranches
commands.description: Show local branches with upstream, ahead/behind, and last commit info.

commands.name: gclean-branches
commands.description: List or delete local branches already merged into a base branch.

commands.name: gwhatpush
commands.description: Show what git push would do for the current branch (ahead/behind, commits, diffstat).

commands.name: gundo-last
commands.description: Safely undo the last commit with upstream safety checks and confirmation.

commands.name: gprepush
commands.description: Run a pre-push checklist (status, whatpush, optional tests).

commands.name: gstage
commands.description: Interactively stage changed files by number.

commands.name: gstatus-all
commands.description: Summarize git status for all repos under a root directory.

commands.name: ripper
commands.description: Interactive ripgrep+fzf code search with bat preview and jump-to-editor.

commands.name: process-kill
commands.description: Interactive process picker+killer using ps + fzf.

commands.name: git-branchcheck
commands.description: Interactive git branch picker; switches or creates tracking branches.

commands.name: note
commands.description: Fast daily note capture/append in a date-stamped Markdown file.

commands.name: tmpserver
commands.description: Start a simple HTTP server for the current directory.

commands.name: port-kill
commands.description: Find and kill processes listening on a given TCP port.

commands.name: audioswap
commands.description: Interactive audio output device switcher using SwitchAudioSource + fzf.

commands.name: cliphist
commands.description: Clipboard history manager: save, browse, and restore clipboard entries.

commands.name: standup
commands.description: Summarize recent git commits across repos for daily standup.

commands.name: global-replace
commands.description: Safe project-wide search & replace with ripgrep + sd (dry-run by default).

commands.name: diffview
commands.description: Pretty diff between two files or stdin/file using git diff --no-index.

commands.name: brew-explorer
commands.description: Explore Homebrew formulas and casks with fzf and brew info.

commands.name: hist
commands.description: Fuzzy-search full zsh history (most recent first; de-duplicated; optional --exec).

commands.name: proj
commands.description: Fuzzy-jump to frequently used directories via zoxide + fzf.

commands.name: stashview
commands.description: Interactive git stash browser with apply/pop/drop actions.

commands.name: rename-edit
commands.description: Bulk rename files/directories by editing a list in your editor.

commands.name: ssh-open
commands.description: Fuzzy-launch SSH connections from ~/.ssh/config using fzf.

commands.name: envrun
commands.description: Run a command with environment variables loaded from a file (e.g. .env).

commands.name: work
commands.description: Run workspace setup scripts from ~/.config/jp-work.d.

commands.name: dots
commands.description: Friendly wrapper around stow for managing dotfiles.
